name: MPA Establishment
description: Designation of new marine protected areas under the EU Biodiversity Strategy 30x30 target

name: Seagrass Restoration
description: Restoration of Posidonia oceanica and Zostera marina meadows in degraded coastal areas

name: Offshore Wind Siting
description: Biodiversity-sensitive spatial planning for offshore renewable energy installations

name: Fishing Quota Redistribution
description: Reallocation of fishing quotas to support small-scale fishers and reduce bycatch

name: Coastal Wetland Conservation
description: Protection and restoration of salt marshes and coastal lagoons under Habitats Directive

name: Posidonia Meadow Protection
description: Strict protection of Posidonia oceanica habitat under EU Habitats Directive Annex I

name: Marine Habitat Restoration
description: Large-scale restoration of degraded marine habitats under EU Nature Restoration Law

name: Marine Litter Reduction
description: Implementation of EU Single-Use Plastics Directive and MSFD Descriptor 10 measures

name: Sustainable Aquaculture Zone
description: Designation of sustainable aquaculture zones under EMFAF with environmental safeguards

name: Deep-Sea Mining Moratorium
description: Precautionary moratorium on deep-sea mineral extraction in EU waters
